data.text: @Pepperfry @jagograhakjago @petleepeter @sridharvMIRROR @iffathfathima6 @CitizenKamran @DarshanDevaiahB @WeAreBangalore Here are some more - you can clearly see the shattered mirror which was inside the packing. https://t.co/PHOtsyapIr
